name: Charles Bosmann - Business as Usual
description:
Business as Usual is a 2D top down tag game.

Charles Bosmann runs a company. Besides taking care of his own job, he has to figth with disobedient employees, impatient clients, faulty power provision and other daily disasters while the clock is ticking and noone would like to do overtime.

Keep your head out of the water in the tide of business and try to maximalize your income while dealing with clockwork-like micromanagement.
